title: helpmyid
author: helpmyid
content: Hello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.I will not possible but that maybe possible if you can be patience waiting for the next decade to see bitcoin to touch another ath again. Binance has no chance to go up if bitcoin is always going down like this time. I hope that if you can accept the fact that if we have started to enter to the long term journey of the bearish trend. Stock market, crypto and everything are going down right now. BNB is always possible to reach such rate after bitcoin already touched the highest rate again.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: This will hardly happen soon when the current situation in the market is very problematic, there is not much motivation for people to come back or new projects are trending to promote cash flow. into it more. And moreover, the general world economic situation is also very bleak. I think the $1000 round is not difficult, but it takes time for everything to recover and stabilize again. It will probably take a while. In the long run, be well prepared for a long-term plan with this market.

comments.author: Cashi
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.Well, what is soon? We have very likely a bear market now, bro! It's only possible when BTC goes towards 100k and Binance Coin will follow. A different question is if we really NEED Binance Coin? It's just a coin of a large exchange and some competitor coins are much more innovative from a technical perspective.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.soon? means having a short definition of time and is in sight. Unfortunately, it didn't show up for BNB this year. If BNB had to force the price to $1000 then of course not to forget what this was based on when the bear market was just starting, then BNB opportunities would also be much deeper. At the time of writing, BNB is trading at $206 so it probably won't hit $1000 soon for whatever reason.

comments.author: blue_hurricanger
comments.body: Let me talk some sense into you. BNB is a great coin and Binance is a great exchange. But because of this unique relationship between BNB and Binance, it ties them together and when bad news happens, BNB will go down in terms of price. Take the recent SEC investigation on Binance for example. This bad news coming ahead of BTC's price fall so you see in cryptocurrency, more links isn't a good way to pump up.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.IMO, yes that it will reach $1k but not to soon. You need to keep yourself patient while waiting for it because we're still in a bear market and notice how long it shall be there.No one can tell you if this is going to be a short bear market or we're about to see it end soon. Well, as the price of bitcoin goes up again which is a sign that the market is going up again. This could be a sign that we might see it up eventually but don't celebrate yet as we don't know if this is an actual recover or just another trap that will shake again the weak hands.

comments.author: Republikcoin.com
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.I think you definitely know how much BNB costs in today's market. Talking about the possibility of a BNB price of $1000 it's clearly still very possible, but at a price of $213 for BNB at the moment it feels like it requires a huge increase to reach the price of $1000 so that possibility will look very heavy for BNB although it can still happen gradually in the future.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.What is this prediction based on? I see the general situation of the market. Everything is so bad and causing many people to panic. I don't think it will increase quickly again when the impetus for money flow into the market is not much. And now the price is around $200 to go up to $1000 having crossed the old ATH. That could happen in the future, but I think doubles is not the right period to think about that. It would rather be associated with long-term investment.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: BTC and ETH and BNB all have a chance at hitting their old ATH however it’s not anytime soon. We had a brutal fall and it will take years to fix this.What is worse is that inflation is still high and fed will keep rates high and it’s not good for the stock market. So crypto will follow and also fail to rally. We will top but not until things get better.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.Have not you check this section? because there have been several thread created like this  and asks about Binance coin reaching either 1k or above , there is even a thread asking if this going to be lowering that increasing.__________!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!_________________________~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~But answering your question here? of course it will surely reached that level but we cannot expect this to happen very soon as there have been many obstacle to happen.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: 1k is a lot for the future price of binance coin. We didn't even know whether the big bullish can come anytime or not. Remember that if the fact we are in the bearish market that we didn't even know when and what will happen after the bearish trend end. I think that you shall try to put less amounts as your prediction. If bitcoin may touch 100k and it will possible but if bitcoin will reach 10k and it will not.

comments.author: lienfaye
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.Its possible but it might take longer than sooner. As of now the market is in bearish and the price of coins are moving downward. If you're patient and willing to wait even it takes long period then you can witness the price of BNB to reach $1k. But for now forget about that because the market is bloody, much better if you take this chance to buy so you have something to hold when the bearish market is over.

comments.author: robattfield
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.This is not possible and very unlikely to happen. Like many people, I see that the market is showing very bad signals and the price cannot rise as easily as it used to. And with BNB, I think it is also a top altcoin in the current market, but it will be difficult for it to grow rapidly during this period. And before talking about a new ATH, it is better to expect it to be able to revert to the old ATH.

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.if you are asking about how soon? then i may say no and not going to happen , because  Look at the market now , check how even bitcoin struggle to return to its position? is this how you can call a bullying ?but if you wanted to learn if this will going to happen then my answer is completely yes, Binance will not only reach that 1000 dollars but instead will even reach higher up to 5 digits , but this will take time and not going to happen any time soon.

comments.author: litepool.ru
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.It's not possible for me at the moment. BNB is also really cool at what it does and has the strongest community in this space, but as it stands, you are looking to achieve x5 returns to value. With the capitalization it has now, it's unlikely to happen quickly. Maybe I also think this will only be possible in the future when stability and recovery come back. We can then talk about new goals more.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: With the current sentiment of the market, I doubt BNB can hit $1000 soon.  I am not saying it won't but it will take time.  Probably when the market sentiment transitioned from bearish to bullish or when Bitcoin surges after its halving.  That is probably around 2024- 2025.Quote from: litepool.ru on June 20, 2022, 09:22:07 AMIt's not possible for me at the moment. BNB is also really cool at what it does and has the strongest community in this space, but as it stands, you are looking to achieve x5 returns to value. With the capitalization it has now, it's unlikely to happen quickly. Maybe I also think this will only be possible in the future when stability and recovery come back. We can then talk about new goals more.I agree that BNB has a huge community and with CZ around I think it has a great future because this guy is a strategist.  But the market does not work like magic that it would change overnight.  Before the market sentiment shift, it needs to build up momentum.  These momenta are good news, development, and crypto industry atmosphere.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.This speculation seems too crazy and unrealistic in the current market. Most of what we are seeing is a series of projects that have dropped sharply since reaching ATH. And now you give your opinion about seeing it hit a new ATH soon. To understand better, it's not shitcoin but easily pump and dump, and $1000 is also a price I can't imagine even before when a lot of positive news came out.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: helpmyid on June 18, 2022, 11:22:30 PMHello Guys what you think about bnb.can bnb hit 1000$ soon or not.i think bnb hit 1000$ soon. Plz give your opinion.In this market?  Are you crazy or do you just not understand crypto markets?  Nothing is going to go up in the near teams.  Down the road yea maybe but all depends on how this market plays out.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: In your dream. The fact if binance coin seems going down just like any other coins in the market. So, don't expect this to recover again as soon as possible. This may become a very difficult situation for anyone who are looking for the profit from the market. 1k is always possible in the crypto since sky was the limit but doing this in one or two years later may impossible to happen with it.
